title: Homestead National Monument of America: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping         Visit the nearby town of Beatrice, NE for dining, lodging, and other services.   The nearest lodging, dining, fueling, and medical services are located in Beatrice, Nebraska 4 miles east of the monument on West State Highway 4. You will find a variety of restaurants, shops, gas stations, hotels, campgrounds, and other businesses to suit your needs. Learn more about the town of Beatrice here.  The city of Lincoln, Nebraska's state capitol, is 45 miles north of Homestead (about one hour's drive). There you will find even more options for eating, sleeping, transportation, entertainment, and other services.  Learn all about opportunities for camping in the area.
